TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EditorPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class EditorPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含一个 控件集合，这些控件用于编辑 控件的属性、布局、外观和行为。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是控件的只读集合 ，通常由 区域用于跟踪 区域包含的控件集。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by an zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 当 Web 部件页面进入编辑模式，并且用户选择要编辑的控件时，将开始编辑过程。When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins. 区域创建一个新 的对象，该对象包含 区域包含的控件。The zone creates a new object consisting of the controls contained by the zone. 在编辑过程中的各个阶段，区域访问 对象以保存或检索 集合中的控件和当前正在编辑的控件之间的属性值 。At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the object to save or retrieve property values between the controls in the collection and the control currently being edited. 例如，如果需要对一组控件执行一些大容量操作，则可以为自己的编程使用创建控件的集合 。You can create an collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使 对象是只读的，你也可以对集合中引用的基础控件的属性进行编程更改。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的几个用途 。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 此代码示例分为四个部分：There are four parts to this code example: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个名为的自定义控件的类 ，该控件 `TextDisplayWebPart` 在网页中引用并由控件进行编辑 。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is edited by the controls. - 一个引用控件的网页 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，包含一个控件， 其中包含 区域中声明的 Web 部件控件集中的多个控件，并包含一些用于创建和操作对象的事件驱动代码 。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains an control with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains some event-driven code to create and manipulate an object. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载代码示例。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 此代码示例的第二部分是 `TextDisplayWebPart` 控件。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 请注意，控件有一个名为的属性 `ContentText` ; 此属性保存用户在文本框中输入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. 当控件处于编辑模式时，可编辑此自定义属性以及标准 控件属性。This custom property can be edited when the control is in edit mode, along with the standard control properties. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意， `` 页面的元素包含三个控件的声明 。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for three controls. 其中两个控件成为在 执行方法时创建的自定义对象的一部分 `Button1_Click` 。Two of these controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**"，将页面切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所有 控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 单击 " **创建 EditorPartCollection** " 按钮，可以查看 由处理对象的代码所创建的控件的效果 。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the controls that are created by the code that is manipulating the object. 另请注意， 控件允许编辑自定义 `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` 属性。Also, notice that the control allows you to edit the custom `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property. 这是可能的，因为属性是 `WebBrowsable` 在控件的源代码中用特性标记的。This is possible because the property is marked with a `WebBrowsable` attribute in the source code for the control. 如果在编辑 UI 中更新属性值，则必须将页面恢复到正常浏览模式，才能查看更新属性的效果 `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` 。If you update the property value in the editing UI, you must return the page to normal browse mode to see the effect of updating the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的空的新实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化类的空实例 。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 构造函数的此重载由类在内部由 类在内部使用 ，以创建一个空集合对象。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 然后，区域创建 在子区域模板中声明的所有控件的实例，并使用内部方法将它们添加到集合中。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection. 不能使用构造函数的此重载 来创建的新实例 ，并向 其添加控件。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of and add controls to it. 您必须改用构造函数的其他重载之一 。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection editorParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化类的实例 并传入控件的集合 。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 这是构造函数的一个重载， 可用于创建新的 对象并向其中添加 控件。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 即使 构造函数创建的实例是只读的，仍可以 以编程方式访问集合中的各个控件，并调用其属性和方法。Even though the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用构造函数的一种常见情况 是，如果想要对整个控件集执行某个批处理操作 ，例如更改其相关组的内容、外观或位置。One common scenario for using the constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them. 使用构造函数的另一种常见方案 是开发 要与服务器控件关联的自定义控件，以便用户可以编辑控件上的自定义属性。Another common scenario for using the constructor is developing custom controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control. 在此方案中，服务器控件必须实现 接口，并且作为该任务的一部分，它必须实现 方法。In this scenario, your server control must implement the interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the method. 在该方法中，若要启用自定义 控件以编辑服务器控件，必须将 控件添加到 实例，如 对象。In that method, to enable the custom controls to edit your server control, you must add the controls to an instance, such as an object. 然后，可以将控件集合传递给 构造函数来创建一个新的 对象， 区域使用该对象来设置所有控件并开始编辑过程。Then you can pass the collection of controls to the constructor to create a new object, which the zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义， 即使该集合是只读的，仍会执行批处理操作来更改 集合中的单个控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom and, even though the collection is read-only, still perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此事件中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 对象，将页面中的两个控件中的两个 控件添加到对象中，然后 使用构造函数创建新的对象 。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, adds two of the three controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它还演示如何对基础控件进行更改 ，即使该集合是只读的。It also demonstrates how you can make changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection is read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**"，在浏览器中加载页面并将页面切换到编辑模式。You can load the page in a browser and switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所有 控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 单击 " **创建 EditorPartCollection** " 按钮可以查看 添加到对象的两个控件上的效果 。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the two controls that are added to the object.

ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed
Public Function Contains (editorPart As EditorPart) As Boolean

param.name: editorPart
param.span: 要测试其是否为集合成员的 。

span.span: The being tested for its status as a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示集合中是否存在 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定 对象中是否已存在特定控件 。The method determines whether a specific control is already in the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定特定控件是否位于 对象中。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether a particular control is in an object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此事件中的代码不 `Button1_Click` 会在 `LayoutEditorPart1` 添加其他控件时将控件添加到对象。The code in the `Button1_Click` event does not add the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the object when it adds the other controls. 为了确认 `LayoutEditorPart1` 控件不在集合中，代码使用 方法。To confirm that the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is not in the collection, the code uses the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**"，将页面切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所有 控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the all the controls. 如果单击 " **创建 EditorPartCollection** " 按钮，则会注意到控件的背景色与 `LayoutEditorPart1` 其他控件不同，因为它不是对象的一部分 。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the background color of the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is different from the other controls, because it is not part of the object.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As EditorPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::EditorPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 要包含被复制控件集合的 。

span.span: An to contain the copied collection of controls.

param.name: index
param.span: 在数组中放置集合内容的起始点。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 将集合复制到 控件的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建可包含对象中的控件的自定义数组 、这些控件的子集或这些控件的超集，则方法非常有用。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法创建自定义 控件数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a custom array of controls. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 事件中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 控件数组，将该控件添加 `LayoutEditorPart1` 到数组，然后使用 方法将控件从该 对象复制到数组。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an array of controls, adds the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the array, and then uses the method to copy the controls from the object to the array. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**"，将页面切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所有 控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果单击 " **创建 EditorPartCollection** " 按钮，则会注意到自定义数组中所有控件的标题都列在页的底部附近。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the titles of all the controls in the custom array are listed near the bottom of the page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 引用集合的一个空的静态只读实例。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 你希望空集合实例从方法返回适当的对象类型，或将实例与其他对象进行比较，但不需要将成员添加到实例，则静态的只读空实例可减少内存使用量。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed
Public Function IndexOf (editorPart As EditorPart) As Integer

span.span: An that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 一个整数，对应于集合中的 控件的索引。

span.span: An integer that corresponds to the index of an control in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Web 部件页面上有多个控件，并且需要在集合中查找特定的控件，则方法非常有用。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法 在对象中查找控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate an control in an object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 事件中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 对象，然后使用 方法 `PropertyGridEditorPart1` 在该集合中查找该控件，并设置其 属性。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, and then uses the method to locate the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control in the collection, and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**"，将页面切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所有 控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果单击 " **创建 EditorPartCollection** " 按钮，则会注意到 `PropertyGridEditorPart1` 控件（位于页面底部附近）具有标题，但没有边框。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control, which is near the bottom of the page, has a title but no border.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As EditorPart

param.name: index
